Hey guys: Is there a way to Net Send in Linux?
do you mean literally sending a message to windows machines, or you want a work-alike for linux machines
linpopup - X Window System port of Winpopup, running over Samba
smbclient allows you to send from a command line
the only dificulty is adding all the extra bits to authenticate as administrator
normally I would just login to the AP and list associated links
but you could tcpdump the wireless device and sniff for who's sending packets
but that's not a "for sure who is connected" way of doing it
there are tools to try and guess the manufacture of the device based on the MAC address
